name: Sweet Home: Look and Find Collector's Edition
name_original: Sweet Home: Look and Find Collector's Edition
description:
Avi Games presents an all-new series for newcomers and seasoned hidden-object seekers with Sweet Home: Look and Find!

Immerse yourself in the comfort and tranquility of home as you relax and enjoy finding objects, solving puzzles, and conquering mini-games in this cozy and clever new game! Take a walk in nature, sit by the pool, and barbecue in the backyard while you hone your skills and complete each challenging level! While you're here, customize your room with decorative items and furnishings, purchase items from a vast inventory, and fill your space with beauty and luxury! Welcome home!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras:

* Stay home and keep the fun going with eight exclusive locations!
* Download gorgeous wallpapers to beautify your own space!
* Mellow out with the exclusive music player!
* Eight bonus and replayable mini-games just for you!
